inclusion.criterion: joint information meeting for women booked for planned CD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: oral and written consent at the day of the CD
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Antibiotic therapy less than one week before caesarean and ≥ 3 prior CDs
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent UTIs, including with Klebsiella/Pseudomonas, which may indicate an increased risk of complications from antibiotic therapy. Additionally, the patient has had multiple prior admissions for UTIs and urosepsis.
